page.title: 03HULL FAIR, 1
page.content: Apart from the public house this area is poorly served regarding entertainment. However, once a year a travelling fair comes. It arrives on the Saturday nearest to October 11th and stays for a week.{Hull Fair}is a great tradition and people from many miles away travel to join in the fun or to provide rides and sideshows. It is the last of the large travelling fairs and comes directly from Nottingham Goose Fair. Hull Fair was traditionally a horse fair but is now puely a fun fair. It has been suggested that it be moved from its traditional{Walton Street}site across the city but this has met with strong opposition. Hull Fair dates from{1299}when {Edward 1st}when he granted a{Charter} permitting both a fair and a market.
